definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to confer a title upon sb/to dub/to crown/to invest with rank or title
the Other List (Qing dynasty register of outlaws)/a blacklist of undesirables

sentences.english: Creative sketchbook allows you to draw websites and web apps.
sentences.chinese: 很有創意的速寫冊，可供你畫出網址和網頁應用軟件。

sentences.english: This book is in six volumes.
Of the top payroll teams, only the Mavs are getting production equal to the investment.
sentences.chinese: 薪水冊頂端的球隊中，只有小牛的產出對得起投入。

sentences.english: Here is the hotel service information  booklet.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們賓館的服務信息冊。

sentences.english: Professor Hunter have a library of about five thousand book.
sentences.chinese: 漢特教授約有五千冊藏書。

sentences.english: Mocky, this comic book looks more interesting.
sentences.chinese: 莫奇，這本連環漫畫冊看起來更有趣。

sentences.english: We have eight thousand books, many of them are rare and valuable.
sentences.chinese: 我們的圖書館有八千冊圖書，很多都是善本和珍本。

sentences.english: Hundreds and thousands of books and magazines doze in the library.
sentences.chinese: 上千上萬冊圖書雜誌在圖書館裏“睡大覺”。

sentences.english: The Well-Tempered Clavier (24), collection of preludes & fugues, Book II.
sentences.chinese: 平均律鋼琴集24首，收集的前奏曲和賦格，第2冊。

sentences.english: His widow has now decided to sell it.
sentences.chinese: 現在他的寡婦決定將相冊出售。

sentences.english: IPSC competitions are governed by the rules in this rulebook.
sentences.chinese: IPSC競賽概由本規則冊所載之內容規範之。

sentences.english: We have a great list with thousands assortments of abdominoplasty .
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個偉大的腹壁品種數千冊。

sentences.english: I chose NEW CONCEPT ENGLISH and learned up from book 1 to 4.
sentences.chinese: 我選擇的《新概念英語》，並學完了1至4冊。

sentences.english: Valentine, 9762, was registered on the books "Pardoned by Governor, " and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 範林丁，9762號，已經登記在“州長赦免冊”中。

sentences.english: The collection contained 124 fables divided into 6 volumes.
sentences.chinese: 集合中包含的劃分成6冊124寓言。

definition: to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
to sign (one's name with a pen etc)/to autograph/signature
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
catalog/table of contents/directory (on computer hard drive)/list/contents
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
